title: Profilo Thunderbird
content: Buongiorno, uso Thunderbird e ne sono soddisfatto, il solo problema è che lavoro con vari PC (Windows 10 e 11 e versioni Thunderbird 128 e 139), ho vari accounts (8) e su un cloud Onedrive. Ogni volta che devo installare Thunderbird su un nuovo PC o faccio una modifica nella rubrica, devo aggiornare ogni PC singolarmente. La domanda è : è possibile avere un solo profilo Thunderbird sul cloud per tutti i PC e che permetta di avere tutte le informazioni (accounts, mails, rubrica, componenti aggiuntivi, ecc.) automaticamente aggiornate su tutti i PC? Grazie, cordiali saluti, Antonio
creator: antonio.lisi

title: Issue with search in list view
content:
Hello, I have a large database of emails. When i conduct a search from the search bar then it gives me a wide list of search results with multiple emails and different filter options on the left side. However, when i select the option "show result as list" from the top right, then on another window with list view it only shows very few mails and not all.

For example, on initial search it shows 109 emails for that particular keyword search. But on choosing show as list - it shows only 30 emails (instead of 109) !!. Screen shots attached for above example.

Kindly advise how to resolve.

title: E-mail disappeared from both the inbox and trash
content: I have a thunderbird account with access from three different computers. I have two issues with the account: after more or less a week the last thirtish emails trasfer automatically to trash, so I usually retransfer them to the inbox manually. BUT this week they have been permanently deleted. Not by me, the emails just disappeared... they are not in the trash. Nor in the spam folder, nor archive. I understand I cannot recover the last emails, but I would like to know why the emails are transferring to the trash automatically in the first place. I tried looking at the settings but I didn't find anything out of the ordinary. Please let me know, thanks!

title: Thunderbird will not download e-mail from yahoo.com
content:
23 June 2025

I'm still unable to fix ongoing e-mail Download into my Thunderbird from my yahoo.com acc on My Desktop or Laptop. I've re-set Password on both Yahoo & Thunderbird ...

On checking my Thunderbird e-mail I get these error messages:

Mozilla Thunderbird ESR Authentication failure while connecting to server pop.mail.yahoo.com

Mozilla Thunderbird ESR Thunderbird Connection to server pop.mail.yahoo.com timed out

I've had Thunderbird for well over 10 yrs in US & now in the UK, no problem. The only recent changes I've done is to change my Yahoo.com Password & updated it on Thunderbird. Once that was done Thunderbird failed to download my messages to my Inbox.

twj

title: Text color is not working
content:
Hi, I am retired, but it does. not mean that tb shall be useless. Used to be simple and to make messaging easier. Now it is opposite.

When replying to a message, I want to change font of what my friend have sent me. Color picker does not work. I press the square, picker appears, I select the color, it appears on the picker, I click ok, and close. Nothing happens. Nothing happens, Nothing happens. I repeat, and it shows black as chosen color. I chose red. There is no way to select and use the color. Some time ago, someone wrote that it kind of works. Kind of works. When you choose color, you must not use it, but close the color chooser. So far, nothing works. It is handy to change the font color but it does not work. But if it works, who knows how to use it. NOt intuitively at present.

Also when the message arrives, I have no clue that it has. It does not indicate on icon anymore. But when I open the tb, i can see on one or another account so many messages new, unread, but am struggling every time to find them out. So far, I have to search every time again and again to filter only unread.... This makes tb very difficult to use rather than easy. Can't you make a simple version of tb without a million of useless to me features. I want to have an access as used to be to all email and in an instant to be able to see, not search the new ones? Is it impossible? Thanks. Michal
creator: 26whitebox
